subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|親%指|おや%ゆび}}: [[thumb]]
* {{ja-r|人%差し指|ひと%さしゆび}}: [[forefinger]], [[index finger]]
* {{ja-r|中%指|なか%ゆび}}: [[long finger]], [[middle finger]]
* {{ja-r|薬%指|くすり%ゆび}}: [[ring finger]], [[medical finger]], the [[third finger]] (UK), the [[fourth finger]] (US)
* {{ja-r|小%指|こ%ゆび}}: [[little finger]], [[ear-finger]], [[pinkie]]
* {{ja-r|指%関%節|ゆび%かん%せつ}}: knuckle, finger joint
